attributes.action: 'Chris Lester - England', England's national football teams Euro 2012 song
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to officially make, 'Chris Lester - England', the official England Nation Football Team, Euro 2012 song. I would like the government to hear this song and recognise that it is a suitable record for England during Euro 2012 and relates to the great aspects of England as a country and should therefore, be officially made England's Euro 2012 song.
